text: What can I do with this bayonet? Make a rose bush of it?
Make a rose bush of it? Poke it into the moon?
Poke it into the moon? Shave my legs with its silver?
Shave my legs with its silver? Spear a goldfish?
Spear a goldfish? No. No.
No. No. It was made
It was made%% in my dream
in my dream%% for you.
for you. My eyes were closed.
My eyes were closed. I was curled fetally
I was curled fetally%% and yet I held a bayonet
and yet I held a bayonet%% that was for the earth of your stomach.
that was for the earth of your stomach. The belly button singing its puzzle.
The belly button singing its puzzle. The intestines winding like alpine roads.
The intestines winding like alpine roads. It was made to enter you
It was made to enter you%% as you have entered me
as you have entered me%% and to cut the daylight into you
and to cut the daylight into you%% and let out your buried heartland,
and let out your buried heartland, to let out the spoon you have fed me with,
to let out the spoon you have fed me with, to let out the bird that said fuck you,
to let out the bird that said fuck you, to carve him onto a sculpture until he is white
to carve him onto a sculpture until he is white%% and I could put him on a shelf,
and I could put him on a shelf, an object unthinking as a stone,
an object unthinking as a stone, but with all the vibrations
but with all the vibrations%% of a crucifix.
